author: tersec
content: That _is_ taking your claim seriously. That's what that looks like.

author: username187666
content: I know I took the bait but I'm not a very hard catch

author: tersec
content:
There are two relevant cases here; everything else reduces to one of these:

1) What you're saying is broadly true (regardless of maybe a misphrased detail, or whether you can code an example exploit, or anything else), even if maybe there's a vulnerability which exists and isn't quite as severe as you're describing; and

2) What you're saying is broadly false, and no such vulnerability exists.

Either way, the correct (and, if (1), profitable) next step is to contact the EF via the bug bounty program.

This is independent of your, or anyone else's here, skillsets

author: username187666
content: To be skeptical and have your presumptions is expected and understandable but to undermine somebody in a rude way is another

author: ajsutton
content:
If you have a vulnerability to report, please submit it to the bug bounty program. You earlier stated you are unable to code and thus can't provide an actual proof of concept for the vulnerabilty - that is the lack of skillset I was referring to.
As a server mod please take this as your final warning. This is not the appropriate venue to discuss claimed vulnerabilities, they should be reported to the bug bounty program. If you continue to post on this topic you will be banned.

author: username187666
content: I'm not even here to talk about it or argue in the first place I'm only here to get into contact with someone so that I can discuss this responsibly if it's not to much trouble can you please help me get into contact with somebody this is not a "bug" can you assist me with that

author: username187666
content: I have emailed the eth bug bounty program and have not gotten a reply

author: ajsutton
content:
Either they need more time to review the submission or it was so low quality that they considered it spam. Either way, the bug bounty is the place to report this. It is staffed by extremely knowledgable and cautious people who do not dismiss reports lightly. 
Meanwhile I have put you on a 1 day timeout because I've told you multiple times now that this is not the appropriate channel and to stop posting. I don't think you're being malicious so didn't ban you permanently but you can be very confident that any of the mods will ban you without further warning if you start this again after the timeout expires.
